    • importToCSV

      public void importToCSV(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Allows importing data from a CSV file into the application's inventory. Reads CSV file, creates InventoryData objects, and adds them to a temporary table (not added to the main inventory).
      Parameters:
